results.text_hl: However, @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ can be life-threatening when @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ is used as a combination therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System
results.text_hl: In line with other studies, we also showed that @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@, @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Water_Electrolyte_Imbalance @DISEASE_MESH:D014883 @@@electrolyte abnormality@@@, @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, elevated anion gap, elevated @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@, @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@, age, and unintentional exposure to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are the determinants of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Poisoning @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@ prognosis.

citations.NLM: Mehrpour O, Saeedi F, Hoyte C, Goss F, Shirazi FM. Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System BMC Pharmacol Toxicol. 2022 Jul 13;23(1):49. PMID: 35831909

results.title: A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis
results.text_hl: There is no antidote for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Severe @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@ may be treated with hemodialysis irrespective of the underlying causes.
